title: New: I Am Harlequin – Wild One
content:
Debuted on last nights episode of hit UK drama Skins, I Am Harlequin’s new track Wild One is a touchingly alluring ballad.

There’s a hint of Adele about it, with it’s polished pop sensibilities, yet maintaining a level of emotional integrity that the Someone Like You singer often fails to find. Driven by the powerful vocals of Anne Frier, Wild One opens out into a full blown, choir backed number, capable of toppling the mightiest of hearts.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
